content: This is just a reminder that you can sign up to phone bank, canvass, get trainings  or take other actions at https://events.democrats.org/ in your state or in one of our battleground states (NC, PA, GA, NH, WI, PA, MI, AZ, NV). Volunteers like you make all the difference! We look forward to seeing you at an event soon.
## [South Dakota Voter Information](https://www.vote.org/state/south-dakota/)
Pinned a message.
South Dakota here!
Hello, hello, hello South Dakota?????
I will be the lone South Dakota supporters. I don't care.
Supporters:supporter
I would be happy to help in other states.

Any other South Dakota supporters?

Hello to all of our lovely South Dakota folks! We are looking for someone in SD to host a watch party for the presidential debate on September 10th! If you are interested, please sign up for an info session here: https://events.democrats.org/event/677337/

<a:star_wave:1269735420359606369> Hey, Team! We know you want to help make a difference! Did you know though that hosting a debate watch party is an amazing way to get involved and bring people together? <a:rainbow_heart_scribble:1269029739432120465> It‚Äôs all about good vibes, great conversations, and getting folks fired up for the election. Your watch party could be the spark that motivates someone to vote! <a:PinkFlames:1252802562659193004>  [Register your watch party](https://events.democrats.org/c/host-a-debate-watch-party/event/create/) to get access to all sorts of resources for throwing a successful debate watch party, including a [Host Information Session](https://events.democrats.org/event/677337/). <a:ThanksRainbow:1278765693579431967>

Good morning South Dakota, congratulations on being one of the first states in the nation to begin early voting!!  You have a chance to enshrine abortion rights in your state constitution!  MAGA Republicans are trying very hard to supress the vote, so its up to you to take advantage of all the opportunites you have!  Go to the link provided to learn about your states deadlines!! https://www.vote411.org/
well im from there but moved to Oklahoma tho
Box Elder, watching and donating to Geeks and Nerds for Harris!
Go South Dakota, Go!
Remember South Dakota, you can only register to vote in person or by mail.  The deadline is 10/21.  Don‚Äôt wait!!

Want to join me for this event? https://mobilize.us/s/NPgfUm

On this day 4 years ago, a record 3.3 million Americans cast their ballot early.  And as expected, only 1.7 million early votes have been cast (a 45% decrease).  Please use the link below or call the Democratic Voter Assistance Hotline 9am-9pm (EST) (1-833-336-8683) to request an absentee ballot, or make a plan to vote early or on election day.  https://iwillvote.com/
Want to join me for this event? https://mobilize.us/s/PNzBX2

<:mega2:1269006580976976076> A reminder that we have a dedicated ‚Å†https://discord.com/channels/1242249109298221066/1288163431911788586 Reddit channel where we coordinate our efforts to post campaign content, leave comments, and upvote <:kamala1:1269028302203523114> <:WalzSmile:1270424129853456445> -related posts. Right now even supportive subreddits like r/politics are bombarded with Trump info, and we're trying to change that. Let's help people find information about our candidates and the brighter future they offer! Head on over to our channel and we'll plug you in with opportunities to contribute. Even if you have just one minute to help, you can make a difference.

<@&1245910887487897621>  In-person absentee voting in South Dakota is happening. Can you take a second today to make sure you and your network have what they need to vote? 
Here‚Äôs what you can do:

1. Reach out to everyone in your network with this message, that can also be found in Reach: 

Absentee voting in South Dakota  is happening, so I‚Äôm reaching out to everyone I know to make sure they have their plan to vote. This race is really close. We need everyone to turn out to vote. Don‚Äôt wait: Visit IWillVote.com/SD and make your plan to vote early.

2. Share this image and message on your social media! 
3. Make YOUR plan to vote! Head to https://iwillvote.com/sd to find information about voting early near you.
React with ‚úÖwhen you‚Äôve done it, and let us know here - when are you going to cast your vote for Kamala Harris and Tim Walz?

<@&1245910887487897621> The last day to register to vote in-person or by mail is October 21 in South Dakota! Can you take a second today to make sure you and your network are all set to vote?
Here‚Äôs what you can do:

1. Reach out to everyone in your network with this message, that can also be found in Reach: 

The voter registration deadline in our state is approaching! I‚Äôm reaching out to everyone I know to make sure their registration is up to date. This election is too important to miss. Will you check your registration status? Here‚Äôs the link: https://IWillVote.com/SD

2. Share this image on your social media! It can also be found in Reach! ‚ú® Make sure you‚Äôve joined Reach for campaign updates here: https://app.reach.vote/join/7DRDMN
3. Check your own registration, at IWillVote.com. 
React with ‚úÖwhen you‚Äôve done it!

<:eyes:1252803301137842251>  Looking for more ways to get involved and get out the vote? **Join us Monday through Saturday for our GOTV Power Hours**, where you'll learn everything you need to know to reach out to your friends, family, and online communities and make sure they get out the vote! üó≥Ô∏è Sign up HERE: https://txt.democrats.org/GOTVHour 

<:retweet:1278893511780864010> Check out our priority content from Reach to share HERE: https://share.kamalaharris.com/toolkit/Discord-2f08

In celebration of Kamala's birthday lets trade candles for calls and gifts for gumption! We're trying to reach over 3 million voters today! Can you help?  Knock out some calls while you are drinking your morning coffee and still be out in time to hit up a pumpkin patch! Join the [5M Dial-a-thon](https://events.democrats.org/event/730026/) and help make history!

**Courage is mastery of fear, not absence of fear.** Which [**Phone Bank with Team Harris-Walz**](https://events.democrats.org/event/725393/?utm_source=Discord&utm_medium=Posts&utm_campaign=Daily%20Engagement) are you signing up for right now?

<@&1245910887487897621> FOLKS, WE LOVE YA, AND YOUR DEDICATION TO THIS CAMPAIGN! WHAT IS OF IMMEDIATE HELP RIGHT NOW IS TO  HOP ON THE DIALER RIGHT NOW AND HELP US GET TO 5 MILLION CALLS!!! 

WE ARE LESS THAN 600K AWAY FROM IT, AND WE CAN DO THIS, BUT WE NEED ALL OF YOU TO HELP US GET THERE!

HOP ON THE DIALER RIGHT NOW AND CALL SOME AWESOME WISCONSIN VOTERS: https://democrats.call.scaletowin.com/?t=f80c83d9-aa81-404c-9137-bbd269d6b1c7&ref=discord

## We're back! We're getting SO close to our goal of 5 million goals and have one more hour to call west coast voters - [please come join us](https://democrats.call.scaletowin.com/?t=09bd534e-841d-495f-b590-68e74150764e&ef=discord) to call NV voters! Even a few calls helps us reach our goal. ü§©

Happy Monday!

 We made almost 5 million calls this weekend to celebrate Kamala's birthday!
